article: zairean rebel leader laurent kabila , whose troops are poised to capture lubumbashi , said tuesday that his next target was the capital kinshasa , and urged prime minister etienne tshisekedi to quit .
abstract: kabila says kinshasa next target urges tshisekedi to resign
